String.string: Move quickly! Don't let Kanmur's death be in vain!
Report to Commander Fraya at Allemantheia Headquarters and speak with her about Thulsa's movements. [Speak to {@linkcreature:72#1103#Arshadh} to enter the Allemantheia Headquarters.]
Take a {@linkcreature:72#1012#pegasus} to Kaiator. Find Commander {@linkcreature:84#1150#Tamur} and ask for Kaiator's aid in stopping Thulsa.
You've arrived at the Plaza of Triumph!
Follow Commander Tamur to the Plaza of Triumph.
The situation has suddenly changed. Go to Adjutant Daakem and inquire what you should do now.
Tell Karima that you're ready to speak to Tamur.

Tell Commander {@linkcreature:410#5005#Tamur} in the Kaiator Command Center that a meeting of the doyens has been called. (Speak with {@linkcreature:84#1153#Karima} in Agora to visit the Kaiator Headquarters.)
Kaia wants to speak with you.
